narration.text: Welcome to DAWG AI's AI Production Tools. These five features replace thousands of dollars worth of plugins and years of engineering experience.
Let's start with AI Comp. I've recorded multiple vocal takes here. Watch as AI analyzes every take and automatically creates the perfect comp.
Select multiple clips, open the AI menu, and click AI Comp. The AI listens to pitch accuracy, timing, energy, and tone - then picks the best moments from each take.
In seconds, we have a flawless vocal comp that would take a professional engineer 30 minutes to create manually.
Next is AI Pitch Correct. This isn't your typical auto-tune that sounds robotic. Our AI understands natural vocal vibrato and expression.
Select your vocal clip, choose AI Pitch Correct, set the key to C major, and adjust the amount. Watch as it corrects pitch while preserving the emotional performance.
Perfect pitch without losing the soul of the performance. That's the difference between AI and traditional auto-tune.
Now AI Time Align. This is where things get really impressive. Traditional quantization either sounds too robotic or doesn't fix enough.
Our AI Time Align understands musical context. It aligns to the grid while preserving intentional timing variations that make music feel human.
Listen to this before and after. The groove is locked in, but it still feels natural and alive.
AI Mix is where studio engineering meets artificial intelligence. Select your tracks and let AI analyze frequency masks, dynamic range, and stereo field.
It automatically sets levels, applies EQ to eliminate frequency conflicts, adds compression for consistency, and creates a balanced stereo image.
In 10 seconds, you get a mix that would cost hundreds of dollars at a professional studio.
Finally, AI Master - the finishing touch. This applies the same techniques used in mastering studios that charge $100 per song.
The AI targets streaming standards - negative 14 LUFS for Spotify, Apple Music, and YouTube. It adds sparkle with an exciter, width with stereo enhancement, and warmth with analog saturation.
Your track goes from bedroom demo to radio-ready in seconds. Five AI tools that replace thousands in plugins and years of experience. This is DAWG AI.

callouts.text: AI Analyzing Pitch, Timing, Energy, Tone
